tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
### Keys to Success
---
1. Attend your scheduled coaching sessions.
2. Utilize live chat for any questions you have in product. To chat click the top right chat icon on the screen.‚Üó

3. Encourage others to join Dynatrace by deploying the oneagent and joining coaching sessions.

4. Understand the Smartscape. Its how Dynatrace organizes the data we collect and the easiest way to get more comfortable with the product

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
### [The Smartscape](#smartscape;gf=all)
---

1. Datacenter
 * Physical location where Host resides
2. [Hosts](#newhosts;gf=all;gtf=l_2_HOURS)
 * A physical or virtualized operating system
    * Windows 
    * Linux
3. [Processes](#newprocessessummary;gf=all;gtf=l_2_HOURS)
 * A currently executing computer program on a host
    * Java JVM
    * .Net Process
4. [Services](#newservices;filter=anyFilter;gtf=l_2_HOURS;gf=all)
 * A set of code or classes that performs some type of business logic
    * Transactions
    * Response Time
    * Failure Rate
    * Purepaths
  * [Databases](#databases;gf=all;gtf=l_2_HOURS;sortmode=mode_service_load) are Services
5. [Applications](#uemapplications;gf=all;gtf=l_2_HOURS)
  * The point that end users interact with Services to perform business logic 
    * Think User Analytics

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
### Dynatrace Key Terms
---

1. [Dynatrace OneAgent](https://www.dynatrace.com/support/help/shortlink/oneagent-hub)
 * OneAgent is responsible for collecting all monitoring data within your monitored environment. A single OneAgent per host is required to collect all relevant monitoring data‚Äîeven if your hosts are deployed within Docker containers, microservices architectures, or cloud-based infrastructure.
2. [Smartscape](https://www.dynatrace.com/support/help/shortlink/smartscape)
 * Smartscape visualizes your entire application environment. Smartscape auto-discovery delivers a quick and efficient overview of all the topological dependencies in your infrastructure, processes, and services, 

4. [Dynatrace Glossary](https://www.dynatrace.com/support/help/reference)
